channel.title: about on Gastón Rial Saibene
channel.description: Recent content in about on Gastón Rial Saibene

item.title: About
item.description: Biography Gastón Rial Saibene is a telematic engineer, specialized in communication systems, who studied at Universidad de Montevideo in Uruguay. During his studies, he had a great interest in machine learning and cybersecurity, which led to a joint effort with CERTuy to improve the detection of Advance Persisten Threat actors for government websites. The work, which is summarized in Memoria de Investigaciones en Ingenieria Nr.18, was awarded by the National Academy of Engineering of Uruguay in the category of computing.
